summary.para: Generation of sine wave, square wave, ramp and uniform white noise.
提供正弦波、方波、白噪声和等差数列的生成。
Generates a sequence containing a ramp pattern specified by the first value and delta.
Chinese Simplified: 产生一个等差数列，数列的项数由数组x的长度给出，首项由start给出，公差由delta给出。

param.name: x
param.para: contains the ramp pattern sequence.
Chinese Simplified: 返回的等差数列

param.name: start
param.para: the first value of ramp pattern.
Chinese Simplified: 等差数列的首项

param.name: delta
param.para: the interval between two adjacent values in ramp pattern.
Chinese Simplified: 等差数列的公差

summary.para: Generates a sequence containing a sine wave with specified frequency and sampling rate.
Chinese Simplified: 生成一个正弦波形，可设定正弦波的幅度、初始相位、频率和采样率。

param.name: x
param.para: contains the sine wave sequence.
Chinese Simplified: 返回的正弦波形。

param.name: amplitude
param.para: the amplitude of sine wave.
Chinese Simplified: 幅度。

param.name: phase
param.para: the initial phase of the sine wave in degrees.
Chinese Simplified: 初始相位，以角度(Degree)为单位。

param.name: frequency
param.para: the frequency of sine wave in Hz.
Chinese Simplified: 正弦波的频率，以Hz为单位。

param.name: samplingRate
param.para: the sampling rate of sine wave in samples/second.
Chinese Simplified: 采样率，以S/s为单位。

summary.para: Generates a sequence containing a sine wave with complete periods.
Chinese Simplified: 生成一个包含整数个周期的正弦波形，可设定正弦波的幅度、初始相位和周期数。

param.name: x
param.para: contains the sine wave sequence.
Chinese Simplified: 返回的正弦波形。

param.name: amplitude
param.para: the amplitude of sine wave.
Chinese Simplified: 幅度。

param.name: phase
param.para: the initial phase of the sine wave in degrees.
Chinese Simplified: 初始相位，以角度(Degree)为单位。

param.name: numberOfCycles
param.para: the number of complete periods of the sine wave.
Chinese Simplified: 正弦波周期数。

summary.para: Generates a sequence containing a square wave with complete periods.
Chinese Simplified: 生成一个包含整数个周期的方波波形，可设定方波的幅度、占空比和周期数。

param.name: x
param.para: contains the square wave sequence.
Chinese Simplified: 返回的方波波形。

param.name: amplitude
param.para: the amplitude of square wave.
Chinese Simplified: 幅度。

param.name: dutyCycle
param.para: the percentage of time the square wave remains high in one period.
Chinese Simplified: 占空百分比，为0~100之间的数值。

param.name: numberOfCycles
param.para: the number of complete periods of the square wave.
Chinese Simplified:方波周期数。

summary.para: Generates a sequence containing a square wave with specified frequency and sampling rate.
Chinese Simplified: 生成一个方波波形，可设定方波的幅度、占空比、频率和采样率。

param.name: x
param.para: contains the square wave sequence.
Chinese Simplified: 返回的方波波形。

param.name: amplitude
param.para: the amplitude of square wave.
Chinese Simplified: 幅度。

param.name: dutyCycle
param.para: the percentage of time the square wave remains high in one period.
Chinese Simplified: 占空百分比，为0~100之间的数值。

param.name: frequency
param.para: the frequency of square wave in Hz.
Chinese Simplified: 方波的频率，以Hz为单位。

param.name: samplingRate
param.para: the sampling rate of square wave in samples/second.
Chinese Simplified: 采样率，以S/s为单位。

summary.para: Generates a uniformly distributed pseudorandom sequence in the range [–amplitude, amplitude].
Chinese Simplified: 生成一个幅度在[–amplitude, amplitude]之间的随机白噪声波形。

param.name: x
param.para: contains the uniformly distributed, pseudorandom sequence.
Chinese Simplified: 返回的白噪声波形。

param.name: amplitude
param.para: the amplitude of uniform white noise.
Chinese Simplified: 噪声幅度。

summary.para: Generating sine wave with Gaussian modulation
Chinese Simplified: 生成含有经高斯调制的正弦波

param.name: sampleCount
param.para: Sample count of sine wave with Gaussian modulation
Chinese Simplified: 高斯调制正弦波的采样点数

param.name: envelope
param.para: envelope of sine wave with Gaussian modulation
Chinese Simplified: 高斯调制正弦波的包络

param.name: amplitude
param.para: amplitude of sine wave with Gaussian modulation
Chinese Simplified: 高斯调制正弦波的幅值

param.name: delay
param.para: peak delay in second for sine wave with Gaussian modulation
Chinese Simplified: 对高斯调制正弦波的峰值进行移位，以秒为单位

param.name: samplingRate
param.para: sample rate of sine wave with Gaussian modulation
Chinese Simplified: 高斯调制正弦波的采样率

param.name: centralFreq
param.para: center frequency or carrier frequency in Hz
Chinese Simplified: 中心频率或载波的频率，以赫兹为单位

param.name: attenuation
param.para: attenuation on both sides of the center frequency. In dB and must be greater than 0.
Chinese Simplified: 中心频率两侧的功率衰减，必须大于0，以dB为单位

param.name: normalizedBandwidth
param.para: The bandwidth at the attenuation(dB) in the normalized power spectrum must be greater than 0.
Chinese Simplified: 用于归一化功率谱中衰减(dB)处的带宽，必须大于0

returns.para: output sine wave with Gaussian modulation.
Chinese Simplified: 输出高斯调制正弦波

summary.para: Generate waveform containing Gaussian monopulse.
Chinese Simplified: 生成含有高斯单脉冲的波形

param.name: sampleCount
param.para: Sample count of Gaussian monopulse.
Chinese Simplified: 高斯单脉冲的采样点数

param.name: amplitude
param.para: amplitude of sine wave with Gaussian modulation
Chinese Simplified: 高斯调制正弦波的幅值

param.name: delay
param.para: peak delay in second for sine wave with Gaussian modulation
Chinese Simplified: 对高斯单脉冲中的点进行移位，以秒为单位

param.name: samplingRate
param.para: sample rate of Gaussian monopulse
Chinese Simplified: 高斯单脉冲的采样率

param.name: centralFreq
param.para: center frequency or carrier frequency in Hz
Chinese Simplified: 中心频率或载波的频率，以赫兹为单位

returns.para: Chinese Simplified: 输出高斯单脉冲

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Fundamental.Generation.Digital.Gradient(System.Int32,System.Int32)

summary.para: Generate digital signal of that period is halved in turn.
Chinese Simplified: 生成数字信号，信号的周期依次减半

member.param: 数字信号包括的采样数
数字信号包括的信号数

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Fundamental.Generation.Digital.Marching(System.Int32,System.Int32,SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Fundamental.DigitalState,SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Fundamental.DigitalState)

summary.para: Generate digital signal of that the binary value of the first signal of the first sampling will be moved to the next signal of the subsequent sampling set of the waveform in order.
Chinese Simplified: 生成数字信号，第一个采样的第一个信号的二进制值将按顺序移至波形后续采样子集的下一个信号

member.param: 数字信号包括的采样数
数字信号包括的信号数
数字信号中穿过的二进制值，默认值为1
数字信号的二进制值，默认值为0

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Fundamental.Generation.Digital.Periodic(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Fundamental.DigitalState,SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Fundamental.DigitalState)

summary.para: Generate multi cycle digital signal, each cycle consists of a digital signal and idle state.
Chinese Simplified: 生成多周期数字信号，每个周期包含由一段数字信号和空闲状态组成

member.param: 数字信号包括的采样数
数字信号包括的信号数
数字信号要包括的周期数
空闲状态要包括的采样数
初始数字位状态，默认值为1
空闲状态的数字位状态，默认值为0

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Fundamental.Generation.Digital.Single(System.Int32,System.Int32,SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Fundamental.DigitalState)

member.param: 数字信号包括的采样数
数字信号包括的信号数
数字信号的数字位状态，默认值为0

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Fundamental.Generation.Digital.Random(System.Int32,System.Int32)

summary.para: Randomly generate digital signals containing 0 and 1. There is no mathematical law for the numerical generation of random waveform.
Chinese Simplified: 随机生成含0和1的数字信号，用于生成随机波形的数值产生没有任何数学规律

member.param: 数字信号包括的采样数
数字信号包括的信号数

member.name: M:SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Fundamental.Generation.Digital.Switch(System.Int32,System.Int32,SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Fundamental.DigitalState,SeeSharpTools.JY.DSP.Fundamental.DigitalState)

summary.para: Generate digital signal of that the value 1 is used to generate binary values in even samples and the value 2 for odd samples.
Chinese Simplified: 生成数字信号，值1输入用于产生偶数采样中的二进制值，值2输入用于产生奇数采样中的二进制值

member.param: 数字信号包括的采样数
数字信号包括的信号数
数字信号的第一个数字位状态，默认值为0
数字信号的第二个数字位状态，默认值为1

members.member: Constants for DFTI, file "mkl_dfti.h" DFTI configuration parameters

summary.para: Computes spectrum of a time-domain signal.
Chinese Simplified: 计算信号的频谱。
Computes the power spectrum of input time-domain signal.
Chinese Simplified: 计算输入信号的功率频谱。

param.name: waveform
param.para: input time-domain signal.
Chinese Simplified: 输入的时域波形。

param.name: samplingRate
param.para: sampling rate of the input time-domain signal, in samples per second.
Chinese Simplified: 输入信号的采样率，以S/s为单位。

param.name: spectrum
param.para: output sequence containing the power spectrum.
Chinese Simplified: 输出功率谱。

param.name: df
param.para: the frequency resolution of the spectrum, in hertz.
Chinese Simplified: 功率谱的频谱间隔，以Hz为单位。

param.name: unit
param.para: unit of the output power spectrum
Chinese Simplified: 设置功率谱的单位。

param.name: windowType
param.para: the time-domain window to apply to the time signal.
Chinese Simplified: 窗类型。

param.name: windowPara
param.para: parameter for a Kaiser/Gaussian/Dolph-Chebyshev window, If window is any other window, this parameter is ignored
Chinese Simplified: 窗调整系数，仅用于Kaiser/Gaussian/Dolph-Chebyshev窗。

param.name: PSD
param.para: specifies whether the output power spectrum is converted to power spectral density.
Chinese Simplified: 输出的频谱是否为功率谱密度。

summary.para: Computes the power spectrum of input time-domain signal.
Chinese Simplified: 计算输入信号的功率频谱。

param.name: waveform
param.para: input time-domain signal.
Chinese Simplified: 输入的时域波形。

param.name: samplingRate
param.para: sampling rate of the input time-domain signal, in samples per second.
Chinese Simplified: 输入信号的采样率，以S/s为单位。

param.name: spectrum
param.para: output sequence containing the power spectrum.
Chinese Simplified: 输出功率谱。

param.name: df
param.para: the frequency resolution of the spectrum, in hertz.
Chinese Simplified: 功率谱的频谱间隔，以Hz为单位。

param.name: unitSettings
param.para: unit settings of the output power spectrum
Chinese Simplified: 设置功率谱的单位。

param.name: windowType
param.para: the time-domain window to apply to the time signal.
Chinese Simplified: 窗类型。

param.name: windowPara
param.para: parameter for a Kaiser/Gaussian/Dolph-Chebyshev window, If window is any other window, this parameter is ignored
Chinese Simplified: 窗调整系数，仅用于Kaiser/Gaussian/Dolph-Chebyshev窗。

members.member:
Analysis the spectrum peak and peak frequency.
Chinese Simplified: 计算频谱峰值及峰值频率
the waveform of input signal assuming in voltage sampling interval of timewaveform (s) the calculated peak tone frequency the calculated peak tone voltage peak amplitude, which is 1.414*RMS i.e. peakSignal=peakAmp*sin(2*pi*peakFreq*t)

summary.para: Computes the dB full scale spectrum of input time-domain signal.
Chinese Simplified: 计算输入信号相对于满量程的分贝值。

param.name: waveform
param.para: input time-domain signal.
Chinese Simplified: 输入的时域波形。

param.name: samplingRate
param.para: sampling rate of the input time-domain signal, in samples per second.
Chinese Simplified: 输入信号的采样率，以S/s为单位。

param.name: refFullScale
param.para: the reference full scale of input time-domain signal, in voltage.
Chinese Simplified: 输入信号的满量程幅值，以伏特为单位。

param.name: spectrum
param.para: output sequence containing the dB FullScale spectrum.
Chinese Simplified: 输出dBFs谱。

param.name: df
param.para: the frequency resolution of the spectrum, in hertz.
Chinese Simplified: 频谱间隔，以Hz为单位。
